sen.j: 妙清寺（みょうせいじ）は、京都市北区 (京都市)に所在する日蓮正宗の寺院。
sen.e: Myosei-ji Temple is a Buddhist temple belonging to the Nichiren Shoshu Sect located in Kita Ward, Kyoto City.
Myosei-ji Temple is a Buddhist temple belonging to the Nichiren Shoshu Sect located in Kita Ward, Kyoto City.
Myosei-ji Temple is a Buddhist temple belonging to the Nichiren Sho Sect located in Kita-ku Ward, Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 山号は正法山（しょうほうさん）。
sen.e: Its honorific mountain prefix is Shohosan.
Its honorific mountain prefix is Shohosan.
The sango (literally, "mountain name"), which is the title prefixed to the name of a Buddhist temple) is Shohosan (Mt. Shoho).
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 1982年 (昭和57年) 11月16日 - 建立される。
sen.e: Established: 16th November 1982.
Established: 16th November 1982.
Established: November 16, 1982.
sen.cmt: 指示書に合わせました。

sen.j: 開基は日蓮正宗大石寺第67世法主日顕上人。
sen.e: The kaiki (founding patron) was Nikken Shonin, 67th head priest of Nichiren Shushu Sect Sohonzan (Head Temple) Taiseki-ji Temple.
The kaiki (founding patron) was Nikken Shonin, 67th head priest of Nichiren Shushu Sect Sohonzan (Head Temple) Taiseki-ji Temple.
The kaiki (founding patron) was Nikken Shonin, 67th head priest of Nichiren Shu Sect Sohonzan (Head Temple) Taiseki-ji Temple.

sen.j: 京都府京都市北区小山東花池町25
sen.e: 25 Koyama-higashi Hanaike-cho, Kita Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture
25 Koyama-higashi Hanaike-cho, Kita Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture
25 Koyama-higashi Hanaike-cho, Kita-ku Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture
Otani University
Otani University

Vivre
Vivre
Vivre

sen.j: 京都市営地下鉄北大路駅・鞍馬口駅から徒歩6分
sen.e: 6 minutes walk from Kitaoji Station or Kuramaguchi Station on the Kyoto City Subway.
6 minutes walk from Kitaoji Station or Kuramaguchi Station on the Kyoto City Subway.
6 minutes walk from Kitaoji Station or Kuramaguchi Station on the Kyoto City Subway.

sen.j: 名神高速道路京都東インターチェンジから車で20分
sen.e: 20 minutes by car from the Kyoto-Higashi Interchange on the Meishin Expressway.
20 minutes by car from the Kyoto-Higashi Interchange on the Meishin Expressway.
20 minutes by car from the Kyoto-Higashi Interchange on the Meishin Expressway.
